title: Communication Style Quiz
description: Discover how you naturally communicate in relationships

dimensions.label: Assertive
dimensions.description: Direct, clear, and respectful expression of needs and boundaries

dimensions.label: Passive
dimensions.description: Tendency to avoid conflict and put others' needs first

dimensions.label: Aggressive
dimensions.description: Forceful expression that may override others' feelings

dimensions.label: Passive-Aggressive
dimensions.description: Indirect expression of frustration through subtle actions
